name: florist_get_all_arrangements
description:
Get all flower arrangements in the catalog.

Args:
    limit: Maximum number of arrangements to return (default 100)

Returns:
    List of all flower arrangements

name: florist_get_arrangement_by_id
description:
Get detailed information about a specific flower arrangement.

Args:
    arrangement_id: The unique ID of the arrangement

Returns:
    Arrangement details including flowers, colors, and pricing

name: florist_search_arrangements
description:
Search flower arrangements with multiple filters.

Args:
    query: General search term (matches name, description, flowers)
    category: Filter by category (e.g., "Bouquets", "Roses", "Tropical")
    occasion: Filter by occasion (e.g., "Birthday", "Anniversary", "Sympathy")
    color: Filter by color theme (e.g., "Red", "Pink", "White", "Mixed")
    min_price: Minimum price filter
    max_price: Maximum price filter
    size: Filter by size ("Small", "Medium", "Large", "Deluxe")
    same_day_only: Only show items available for same-day delivery
    in_stock_only: Only show items currently in stock
    limit: Maximum number of results (default 20)

Returns:
    List of matching arrangements

name: florist_get_arrangements_by_occasion
description:
Get flower arrangements for a specific occasion.

Args:
    occasion: The occasion (e.g., "Birthday", "Anniversary", "Valentine's Day",
              "Mother's Day", "Get Well", "Sympathy", "Congratulations", "Thank You")
    limit: Maximum number of results (default 50)

Returns:
    List of arrangements suitable for the occasion

name: florist_get_arrangements_by_category
description:
Get flower arrangements by category.

Args:
    category: Category to filter by (e.g., "Bouquets", "Roses", "Mixed Flowers",
              "Tropical", "Orchids", "Plants")
    limit: Maximum number of results (default 50)

Returns:
    List of arrangements in the category

name: florist_get_arrangements_by_color
description:
Get flower arrangements by color theme.

Args:
    color: Color theme (e.g., "Red", "Pink", "White", "Yellow", "Purple", "Mixed")
    limit: Maximum number of results (default 50)

Returns:
    List of arrangements featuring the color

name: florist_get_same_day_delivery_options
description:
Get arrangements available for same-day delivery.

Args:
    limit: Maximum number of results (default 50)

Returns:
    List of arrangements that can be delivered today

name: florist_get_categories
description:
Get all available arrangement categories.

Returns:
    List of unique categories

name: florist_get_occasions
description:
Get all occasions that we have arrangements for.

Returns:
    List of occasions

name: florist_get_color_options
description:
Get all available color themes for arrangements.

Returns:
    List of color options

name: florist_get_size_options
description:
Get all available arrangement sizes.

Returns:
    List of size options with typical price ranges

name: florist_get_addons
description:
Get available add-ons to enhance flower deliveries.

Args:
    category: Optional category filter (e.g., "Chocolates", "Vases", "Plush", "Cards")

Returns:
    List of add-on products

name: florist_get_addon_categories
description:
Get all add-on categories.

Returns:
    List of add-on categories

name: florist_get_delivery_slots
description:
Get available delivery time slots for a specific date.

Args:
    date: The delivery date in YYYY-MM-DD format

Returns:
    List of available time slots with fees

name: florist_get_delivery_availability_week
description:
Get delivery availability for the next 7 days.

Returns:
    Delivery slots grouped by date

name: florist_check_delivery_slot
description:
Check if a specific delivery slot is available.

Args:
    date: The delivery date (YYYY-MM-DD)
    time_slot: The time slot (e.g., "Morning (8AM-12PM)", "Afternoon (12PM-5PM)")

Returns:
    Availability status and fee information

name: florist_place_order
description:
Place an order for flower delivery.

Args:
    arrangement_id: ID of the arrangement to order
    recipient_name: Name of the recipient
    recipient_address: Full delivery address
    recipient_phone: Recipient's phone number
    delivery_date: Delivery date (YYYY-MM-DD)
    delivery_slot: Time slot (e.g., "Morning (8AM-12PM)")
    card_message: Optional message for the card
    addon_ids: Optional list of add-on product IDs

Returns:
    Order confirmation with details

name: florist_get_my_orders
description:
Get all orders for the current user.

Args:
    limit: Maximum number of orders to return (default 50)

Returns:
    List of orders with details

name: florist_get_order_details
description:
Get details of a specific order.

Args:
    order_id: The order ID

Returns:
    Full order details

name: florist_cancel_order
description:
Cancel a pending or confirmed order.

Args:
    order_id: The order ID to cancel

Returns:
    Cancellation confirmation or error

name: florist_get_subscription_plans
description:
Get all available flower subscription plans.

Returns:
    List of subscription plans with pricing and details

name: florist_create_subscription
description:
Create a new flower subscription.

Args:
    plan_id: ID of the subscription plan
    arrangement_preference: Preference for arrangements (e.g., "Bright & Colorful",
                            "Classic Elegance", "Seasonal Mix", "Tropical Vibes")
    recipient_name: Name of the recipient
    recipient_address: Full delivery address

Returns:
    Subscription confirmation with details

name: florist_get_my_subscriptions
description:
Get all subscriptions for the current user.

Returns:
    List of active and past subscriptions

name: florist_get_subscription_details
description:
Get details of a specific subscription.

Args:
    subscription_id: The subscription ID

Returns:
    Full subscription details

name: florist_pause_subscription
description:
Pause an active subscription.

Args:
    subscription_id: The subscription ID to pause

Returns:
    Confirmation or error

name: florist_resume_subscription
description:
Resume a paused subscription.

Args:
    subscription_id: The subscription ID to resume

Returns:
    Confirmation with next delivery date

name: florist_cancel_subscription
description:
Cancel a subscription.

Args:
    subscription_id: The subscription ID to cancel

Returns:
    Cancellation confirmation or error

name: florist_get_current_user
description:
Get the current logged-in customer's profile information.

Returns information about the currently authenticated customer including
their name, loyalty points, saved addresses, and saved recipients.

Returns:
    User profile with contact info, loyalty status, and saved recipients

name: florist_check_availability
description:
Check if an arrangement is available.

Args:
    arrangement_id: The arrangement ID to check

Returns:
    Availability status and stock information
